author: clelange
body:
#### PR description:

This PR

- cleans up some commented out code in `DQMOffline/PFTau`
- improves the code style in `DQMOffline/PFTau`
- adds `hgcalPFJetValidation`, i.e. some jet-level validation plots for HGCal
- adds a harvesting script (`Validation/HGCalValidation/scripts/harvestHGCalValidationPlots.py`) for 

#### PR validation:

I produced a couple of Pytha8PtGun gluon samples and the plots came out as expected.

CC @rovere
title: HGCal and jets validation plots harvesting
